message: Hi Bob, thank you for considering my product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. Would you be willing to consider that price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $9,500. I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway. I'll sell the product to you for $10,500.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to go a bit lower. How about $9,800?
Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to go as low as $9,800. I'll meet you halfway again. I'll sell the product to you for $10,900.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to go a bit lower. How about $9,500 again?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm not willing to go back to the original offer of $9,500. I'll make one more compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $10,700.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to go a bit lower. How about $9,200?
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I'm not willing to go as low as $9,200. I'll make one more compromise. I'll sell the product to you for $10,400.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to go a bit lower. How about $9,000?
